column5: I bought one a couple years ago and never used it. Give me your address and I'll mail you mine.
Yeah sure would help keep them things organized and you could also use it for spinnerbaits LM

Yes, I bet that works just fine, but I don't need one. I have a plastic tackle box screwed to the top of one of my coolers that holds at least 8 bouncers in their collapsed storage condition, in its larger open tray area, 2 or 3 of each, 1/2 oz, 3/4 oz, and 1 oz, along with 2 homemade small marker floats on top of them.  I am mostly a day-tripper, gotta use space to a premium.
